entry.title: $2700 // Beautiful renovated 3br apt, 2 bathrooms, huge back yard, on the subwa
entry.content:
Beautiful, fully renovated 3 bedrooms apartment in a great location!

No fee!

The apartment:
I finished renovating the entire apartment last month!

There are 3 bedrooms that can easily fit a queen size bed!

There is a huge (500 sqf) back yard that gets very sunny during the day!

The units also features an open kitchen/dining/living area with an island and with large windows.

There are 2 full bathrooms with all new vanities and fixtures and hardwood floors throughout!

There is a video intercom in the apartment.

A lot of sunlight during the day.


The area:
A few minutes from the C Train!

Many restaurants, pharmacies, laundry, banks and everything you need all around!

Very safe a lovely neighborhood.

Feel free to call or text to schedule a viewing

Hadar
